text.en: O lama, precious and enlightened one,
We have no one else to rely on but you.
Look upon us with eyes of compassion
text.en-trans: tukjé chen gyi zik dzö la

text.en: And free us from this ocean of saṃsāra.
text.en-trans: khorwé tso lé dral du sol

text.en: Help us to accomplish all that is good in life,
text.en-trans: tsé di lekpa kün drub ching

text.en: And avoid all that would hinder and obstruct us,
Point out profound luminosity at the moment of death,
And liberate us from the perils of the bardo states.
Ensure that all that we do with body, speech and mind
text.en-trans: lü dang ngak yi tsompa kün

text.en: Always brings about benefit for others.
And from this day forward, transform all adversity
text.en-trans: kyen nam changchub lam chok tu

text.en: Into the supreme path of enlightenment.
text.en-trans: dering nyi né gyur du sol

text.en: In spite of our exertions, liberation is hard to find.
text.en-trans: dak gi bé kyang tarwar ka

text.en: O protector, on the ship of your compassion
Carry us along with all who lack protection,
And lead us to the island of liberation.
May all those who have faith in me
text.en-trans: gangdak dak la dé gyur tam

text.en: And all who slander and abuse me
text.en-trans: mö dam kurpa deb kyang rung

text.en: Be freed from evil and without afflictions,
And may they leave the rivers of existence.
In time, may my very name be enough
text.en-trans: namzhik dak gi ming tsam gyi

text.en: To fulfil the wishes of the world,
And bring down rains of offering clouds
text.en-trans: chok chu gangwé zhing nam su

text.en: In all the buddha realms of the ten directions.
Through this virtue, may all beings
Be liberated from saṃsāric existence
And, gaining the two sacred forms of wisdom,
Spontaneously benefit both themselves and others.
text.en-trans: dön nyi lhün gyi drubpar dzö
